example: I don't think that this transdisciplinary discourse

definition: The act of inspiring or breathing in.

example: This brings us up to the time that I started consulting to Airstream.

definition: The act of consulting or deliberating; consultation; also, the result of consultation; determination; decision.

example: Every year from 1992 to 2000, the Republican leadership of the U.S. Congress added a rider to the District of Columbia appropriations bill that prohibited the use of federal or local funds to implement the Health Care Benefits Expansion Act.
example_meaning: Hàng năm từ năm 1992 đến 2002, lãnh đạo Đảng Cộng hòa của Quốc hội Hoa Kỳ đã thêm người lái vào Quận Columbia dự luật chiếm đoạt cấm sử dụng quỹ liên bang hoặc địa phương để thực hiện Đạo luật mở rộng lợi ích chăm sóc sức khỏe.
definition: Able to be expanded.

example: Maybe he wants to negotiate .
example_meaning: Có thể hắn muốn thương lượng .
definition: (intransitive) To confer with others in order to come to terms or reach an agreement.

example: Welcome to our humble abode .
example_meaning: Chào mừng đến căn nhà khiêm tốn của chúng tôi.
definition: (obsolete) Act of waiting; delay.

definition: Present participle of bear.

example: ♫ With the backup, makeshift life in waiting ♫
example_meaning: ♫ Với cuộc sống tạm bợ , dự phòng đang chờ đợi ♫
definition: A temporary, usually insubstantial, substitution for something else.

example: Stir the grass, and you stifle the snake.
example_meaning: động cỏ, đánh rắn .
definition: Of or pertaining to something stifled or suppressed.

definition: Specter, apparition. [from early 17th c.]

example: Let me tell you what an odyssey that has been.
example_meaning: Để tôi kể cho các bà nghe một cuộc phiêu lưu .

definition: A crazed Norse warrior who fought in a frenzy.

definition: Relating to the mouth.

example: Even light reflected from yourself in the mirror takes some time to reflect back.

definition: (transitive) To bend back (light, etc.) from a surface.

example: You see grace because you want to see grace .

example: Now, I'm a venture capitalist. I make bets.

example: Letters and packages are whisked from country to country by means of airmail.

definition: A quick, light sweeping motion.

example: We should muse over deep spiritual thoughts, become absorbed in them, and meditate on them.
